name: Meatloaf in a Mug
directions: 1. In a small bowl, combine the milk, ketchup, oats and soup mix. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Pat into a microwave-safe mug coated with cooking spray.
2. Cover and microwave on high for 3 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and thermometer reads 160Â°C. Drain.
notes: Serve with additional ketchup if desired.
